deltaprice 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

setup

setup.Rd

setup set up connection to remote browser server

setup(browserName = "chrome", remoteServerAddr = "localhost",
  port = 4444L)

Arguments

browserName

browser to use, default = chrome
remoteServerAddr

IP of server running Selenium server, default = localhost
port

port running Selenium server, default = 4444

Value

Returns a Selenium connection object

Examples

remDr <- setup()
remDr$open()
#> [1] "Connecting to remote server"
